article: republican presidential candidate mitt romney , who as massachusetts governor refused to pardon an iraq war veteran 's pellet gun conviction , on tuesday called u.s. president george w. bush 's commutation of scooter libby 's prison sentence `` reasonable .
abstract: romney defends bush s commutation of libby prison sentence
